description:
It`s all about chocolate. Kobeni is worried. Hakuya is worried. Mashiro is worried. Mayura is laughing. "Valentine`s Day comes with all kinds of interesting human drama!" Nessie. Mongolian Death Worm. Yeti. Nessie. Nessie. Nessie. They say "Nessie" a lot in this episode.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Know! I`ll Fill It with a Sister-in-Law
そうだ, 小姑でうめよう
